<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Morrigna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=340)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Bounty hunters and investigators, morrignas seek out creatures that thwart death or interfere with the natural flow of souls. Morrignas dress in flowing spider silk and wear masks reminiscent of webs, as they consider patient and watchful spiders to be their spiritual kin.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Monitor](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 34

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Psychopomp_Morrigna.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 15">[Morrigna](/Monsters.aspx?ID=340)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Monitor" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=111" />
<trait label="Psychopomp" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=232" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 271</row>

**Perception** +28; darkvision, lifesense 60 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Requian](/Languages.aspx?ID=34); [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +27, [Boneyard Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +28, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +27, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +29, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +29, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +4

**Con** +4

**Int** +3

**Wis** +6

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Lifesense** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) A psychopomp senses the vital essence of living and undead creatures within the listed range.

**Items**
_+2 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 38 

**Fort** +25 

**Ref** +27 

**Will** +29 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 240

, regeneration 20 (deactivated by [acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3) or [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease

**Resistances**
negative 15, poison 15

**Wrappings Lash** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature within reach of the morrigna’s web wrappings uses an action to Strike or attempt a skill check. **Effect** The morrigna makes a web wrappings Strike against the triggering creature. If the strike is a critical hit, the triggering action is disrupted.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 30 feet ([_spider climb_](/Spells.aspx?ID=299))

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_bo staff_ +31 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 2d8+14 bludgeoning plus spirit touch

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
web wrappings +29 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d12+14 bludgeoning plus Grab and spirit touch

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 35, attack +30
- **Cantrips (8th)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Disrupt Undead](/Spells.aspx?ID=79), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307)
- **1st**
[Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Bless](/Spells.aspx?ID=25), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) (4 slots)
- **2nd**
[Calm Emotions](/Spells.aspx?ID=31), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287) (4 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Crisis of Faith](/Spells.aspx?ID=55), [Dream Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=90) (4 slots)
- **4th**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Read Omens](/Spells.aspx?ID=247), [Spell Immunity](/Spells.aspx?ID=296) (4 slots)
- **5th**
[Death Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=64), [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272) (4 slots)
- **6th**
[Field of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=114), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) (4 slots)

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 37
- **4th**
[Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329)
- **Constant (2nd)**
[Speak with Animals](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), [Spider Climb](/Spells.aspx?ID=299)
- **Constant (5th)**
[Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Divine Rituals** DC 37

- **5th**
[Call Spirit](/Rituals.aspx?ID=5)

**[Change Shape](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=8)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Polymorph](/Traits.aspx?ID=127), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) A morrigna can take the appearance of any Small or Medium animal or humanoid. This doesn’t change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it might change the damage type their Strikes deal. Unless they choose to manifest their web wrappings in their new form, they cannot make web wrappings Strikes.

**Spider Minions** <actions string="Three Actions" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) The morrigna summons a [giant tarantula](/Monsters.aspx?ID=387) or [spider swarm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=385). These spiders have the [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) trait and remain for 10 minutes or until reduced to 0 Hit Points, whichever comes first. The morrigna does not need to Sustain the Spell to direct these summoned creatures, and the morrigna can have any number of summoned spiders in existence at once. The morrigna can see through the eyes of any of their summoned spiders at any time.

**Spirit Touch**   A morrigna's Strikes affect incorporeal creatures as though etched with a [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=297) property rune and deal 4d6 negative damage to living creatures or 4d6 positive damage to undead.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-83" />
